means: （某地区、国家的）警察部队（或警察机构）
警官的，警察的，治安管辖区的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (denoting the district under the charge of a constable): from medieval Latin constabularia (dignitas) ('rank) of constable', from constabulus, based on Latin comes stabuli (see constable)

entry.tran: (英国等国家某一地区的)警察部队
entry.def: In Britain and some other countries, a constabulary is the police force of a particular area.

example.ex: ...the Chief Constable of the Nottinghamshire Constabulary.

entry.tran: (美国某一地区的)巡官队伍，巡官队伍辖区
entry.def: In the United States, a constabulary is the constables in a particular area, or the area that they are responsible for.

means.word_mean: 1. the force of policemen and officers;
